rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: spacious area with a small reception area designed to welcome guests and adhere to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: open plan living room adjacent to the entrance hall, featuring large windows for natural light as per Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: designated dining space integrated with the living area, allowing for interaction and light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: functional kitchen with modern Art Deco finishes, located in a corner that respects Vastu guidelines regarding direction of workspaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: private bedroom on the ground floor for the couple, with ample closet space and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: guest bedroom with integrated storage space, located in a quieter section of the floor plan.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: open courtyard serving as a communal gathering area and ventilation source following Vastu principles. It is centrally placed to harmonize with the Art Deco design.

openings.name: Front Entrance
openings.description: main entry door positioned on the front facade in alignment with Vastu.

openings.name: Side Windows
openings.description: windows around the perimeter allowing for balanced light and ventilation according to Art Deco aesthetics and Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Back Door
openings.description: secondary exit door ensuring safe egress as per building regulations.
